about_the_game:
People come here for two things. Eating donuts or ordering someone's death!
Ahh don't worry! Of course, this cozy shop has a killing method to suit your taste. Let's see what's on our menu! Shall we kill with a poisonous snake or with a ninja sword? Let it look like a natural death from a car crash or do we add a bitter poison to your food! Don't forget our rocket launcher and machine gun desserts!

Get a Killing Job from Mystery Clients

Your secret customers, silhouetted on the screen, will tell you the profile information of the victim and how to kill them. It is entirely up to you to accept or reject the job. Once the task is complete, your money will be instantly deposited into your account by bank transfer.
What you need to pay attention to here is the way the job is done. Remember, in order to please your customers, you must kill the victims in the right way, as desired.

Save Money and Buy Materials on the Black Market

Your family's black market market "BLACKAZON" continues to serve you uninterruptedly! In the game, with the money you earn from the jobs you complete, you can supply all kinds of tools that a hitman might need from the virtual black market platform.
From poisonous scorpions to dangerous chemical acids, from sniper rifles to samurai swords, from modified vehicles to tnt explosives, everything is waiting for you in BLACKZONE.

Upgrade your Center Base and Gear your Equipment

Your center is your home! In order to get bigger jobs, you must improve your headquarters, modify your vehicle, level up your gear, and expand your venue. With each task you complete, your experience level will increase and you can make your headquarters a more professional place. You can continue your adventure, which you started with a small one-story back room, in a huge armory by completing missions and gaining experience.

Complete Missions with Dozens of Different Kill Methods

Use your imagination and be a little innovative! We're not talking clichéd Hitman-style silenced guns and backstabbing here! Let's explore some of the trendiest poison recipes and prepare a poison with our knowledge of chemistry. Or let's take the poisonous viper that we have been feeding for days out of its cage and put it quietly in our victim's bed. Did our client want the victim's death to look natural? So let's go for a ride with our mustang car lying in the garage and crush the victim. Get ready to explore dozens of different killing styles and become a Professional Assassin!


Embark on an exciting journey through our vast collection of children's online games, spanning dress-up, puzzle, action games, and beyond on . Immerse your kids in the gaming world with beloved Poki and KralOyun titles. Begin the adventure today, and let the learning and fun commence! You can find many articles about games on Kid Games Free website.

content_descriptors.notes: Hired - Assassin Simulator may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
BUILD YOUR OWN DOJO AND RULE!


About the Game

People come here for two things. Eating donuts or ordering someone's death!
Ahh don't worry! Of course, this cozy shop has a killing method to suit your taste. Let's see what's on our menu! Shall we kill with a poisonous snake or with a ninja sword? Let it look like a natural death from a car crash or do we add a bitter poison to your food! Don't forget our rocket launcher and machine gun desserts!

Your secret customers, silhouetted on the screen, will tell you the profile information of the victim and how to kill them. It is entirely up to you to accept or reject the job. Once the task is complete, your money will be instantly deposited into your account by bank transfer.
What you need to pay attention to here is the way the job is done. Remember, in order to please your customers, you must kill the victims in the right way, as desired.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13.1 Ventura
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Hired - Assassin Simulator

short_description: Shall we kill with a poisonous snake or with a ninja sword? Let it look like a natural death from a car crash or do we add a bitter poison to your food! Don't forget our rocket launcher and machine gun desserts! Be a Professional Hired Killer and Simulate the Assassination.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
